subject: Wrestling
lead_paragraph: Kurt Angle, an Olympic gold medalist who is now the heavyweight champion in Total Nonstop Action Wrestling, has been arrested on charges of possessing a human growth hormone and violating an order of protection.
snippet: Kurt Angle, an Olympic gold medalist who is now the heavyweight champion in Total Nonstop Action Wrestling, has been arrested on charges of possessing a human growth hormone and violating an order of protection.
